column2: shana goldberg meehan scott silveripart ii written by andrew reich ted cohenparts i and ii transcribed by eric aasen
god that is the most beautiful engagement ring ever
you’ve bought like a billion of ‘em
okay well tonight’s the big night
okay listen how are you gonna ask her
it is going to be perfect
i am taking her to her favorite restaurant
i’m going to get her a bottle of the champagne that she really loves therefore knows how expensive it is
then when the glasses are full instead of proposing a toast i’m just gonna propose
you’re gonna mess it up let me do it
i’m not gonna mess it up
if she says no can i have the ring
are any of you guys free tonight
my boss is hosting this charity event for underprivileged kids and the more people i bring the better i look
well monica and chandler can’t go
oh my god i’m so sorry
i just get mad when rachel doesn’t remember where we’re going
i can do that for the kids
i’m making money now it’s about time i give something back
well you could also give back the money you owe me
ross listen can you come to a charity event tonight
oh no i have plans with elizabeth
oh so you’re already doing your part for the kids
i’m sorry it’s just one of my last nights together before she leaves for camp to be a counselor
ross let me ask you a question
all jokes aside where is this relationship going
wait a minute all jokes aside
do you really see this as a long term thing
y’know you are 12 years older than her
wait a minute does does everyone feel this way
uh i thought you guys were just like making jokes i had no idea
uh yes there is a chronological age difference but i never notice it
besides it doesn’t really matter to me what you guys think
i mean i’m the one dating elizabeth not you
that’s not what she said last night
we wanted to wish you good luck
yeah yeah you have the ring
yeah right here in my pocket
okay now will you guys get out of here
i want this is to be a surprise and she’s gonna know
we’re just really…very excited about this charity event that we have to go to
so now what’s going on here
uh well uh this is a silent auction
they lay out all the stuff here and then you write down your offer and then the highest bid gets it
no i know what a silent is i meant what’s going on with your hair
he’s the head of my department
and i also brought my friend joey…
well y’know i i don’t know where he is
well i hope you’re gonna bid on some things rachel
actually i was about to bid on this lovely trip to paris
elizabeth has two friends in the room with her who are named in the credits but not in this scene
so i’m just gonna guess since it doesn’t matter one way or the other
the guys across the hall are throwing water balloons at us
oh you have to call the police
that’s what i did to the kids in my building
no it’s a water balloon fight
listen umm i i just stopped by to see if you wanted to see this play tonight
umm it’s supposed to be excellent
okay look can i can i just just talk to you for a second
uh so this play umm what do you think
now this is a nice suit
our next item is the romantic trip to paris
it goes to emil alexander high a high bid of 2 300
well now it’s an empty bar
you just can’t stand anyone else enjoying themselves can’t you
and finally our biggest item of the night the 22 foot gentleman’s day sailer sailboat
the winning bid was a whooping 20 000
congratulations on your new boat joey tribbiani
pulls him back up and starts applauding again
joey waves and does a salute
indivisible with liberty and justice for all
is everything are you are you perrr perfect
i’m actually i’m a little cold can i have your jacket
uh no you can’t have my jacket
because then i would be cold
if you thought that you were going to be cold you should’ve brought your own jacket
but uh other than that are you okay
in fact i’ve been fine for a long time now and i think the reason is you
okay umm before i meant you i had really little life and i couldn’t imagine growing old with…
i know but just let me say it
oh god maybe he won’t see us
i don’t know why i did that
hey it’s good to see you
you too you let uh your hair grow long
you you always wanted me too
hey i see you got your mustache back
and uh you don’t have a mustache which is good
i’m chandler i make jokes when i’m uncomfortable
no one supposed to know about us
chandler wh why don’t we sit down
or if you prefer this table is available
i didn’t know it was an auction
i figured take a guess help a charity free boat
why would a charity give away a free boat
well just buy the damn boat
phoebe don’t you think you’ve had enough to drink
how is you drinking helping the kids
because the more i drink the less there is for the kids to drink
your generous contribution brings us a big step closer to building the youth center
just out of curiosity how how much is that boat worth
i think it was valued at 19 000
umm i can’t buy the boat i don’t have any money
so uh listen i think i’m gonna take off now
you agreed to buy that boat all right
and plus if you leave my boss is gonna kill me
well what am i gonna do rach
i don’t have that kind of money
all right this is what we’re gonna do we are gonna go to the next highest bidder and we are just gonna let them buy it and then you’re just gonna pay the difference
look i don’t know why the kids need a youth center anyway
they should just watch tv after school like i did and i turned out fine
and so we’re hiding in the bathroom
and and then i sneak out and before monica can her parents come in
so i hide in the shower and the next thing you know they’re going at it right on the bathroom floor
for further reading on the above story please check out the one where joey moves out
i got a good one i got a good one
i once walked in on both my parents making love to the same guy
it’s so great seeing you guys again
i’d like to make a toast
uh as a poet once said in the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter and sharing of pleasures for in the due of little things the heart finds it’s morning and is refreshed
before you say anything have we got a story for you
guess who we bumped into at dinner
i thought you were going out with elizabeth
yeah i was but uh she was a little busy with a water balloon fight
oh ross sometimes grown ups have commitments they just can’t get out of
y’know maybe she is too young for me
y’know when i was over there and she was running around with her friends i felt like i was a baby sitter
i finally started to see what you guys were talking about
i don’t know what to do
why don’t you just weigh out the good stuff about the relationship against the bad stuff
i mean that’s what i did when i first weighing stuff
well i’m i’m 12 years older than she is
if the school finds out you’re fired
umm well she’s she’s sweet and pretty and…
look ross the only question you need to ask is do you see a future
i mean like do you see yourself marrying her
i don’t i don’t see a big future with her
okay well i think…that’s your answer
i’ve got to talk to her
hey you have to forget about elizabeth
i mean if you’re not careful you may not get married at all this year
okay the next highest bidder is at table one
oh and uh the guy who got the paris trip is at table four
why do you care about the guy who won the paris trip
excuse me is the person who won the paris trip at this table
uhh excuse me is there a mr
this is your lucky day mr
bowmont the uh gentleman day sailer as just become available again and i believe that you made a bid of 18 000
you you have to pay that
i was actually relieved uh i didn’t win the boat
what what is your wife’s name
oh god okay just imagine this the pam
i don’t think she’d like that
okay uh uh imagine this the mr
okay look let me paint you a little picture
all right you are settin’ sail up the hudson
you’ve got the wind in your h arms
you you get all that peace and quiet that you’ve always wanted
you can ooh you can get one of those little hats and have people call you captain and then when you’re old cappy
what the hell it’s for a good cause
all that stuff you just said
i i’ll make payments whatever it takes i want the mr
why do you want to see my hand
i wanna see what’s in your hand
what did you guys just do
richard was there so i couldn’t do it
i’m gonna do it tomorrow y’know and and surprise her but now you’ve ruined it
who walks into a room and asks to see a person’s hands
well a palm reader a manicurist a hand doctor…
what am i going to do
look she only suspects something okay
she doesn’t know for sure so just throw her off the track
that’s right i can throw her off
i can make her think marriage is the last thing on my mind
convince her that that you’re scared of commitment
convince her that you’re a little coward
i can do that i’ve had 30 years of practice
hey being you is finally gonna pay off
i had to go all the way to the basement because some idiot keeps stuffing the trash chute with pizza boxes
oh my god you’re here let me see your hand
she already took out the trash
i have never had such a healthy break up
she was such a grown up about it
she didn’t seem too immature for me
did i just make a huge mistake
do i look like a guy who doesn’t want to get married
and also a little like a french guy
oh just hanging out talkin’ about uh websites
yeah we saw this really interesting website about marriage and how totally unnecessary it is and how its just a way for the government to keep tabs on you
although i am y’know glad to hear that you’re branching out on what you look at on the internet
yeah well… y’know it just got me thinking though why would anybody ever want to get married huh
to declare your love for one another to the world
okay well that’s good to know
hey monica there’s a customer who wants to complement the chef should i let him in
actually i’m not here to complement the chef
ohh… oh that’s okay i hate when people come back to complement the chef
like i have nothing better to do
well it was great seeing you the other night
oh good to see you too
did you come down here to tell me that
i came here to tell you something else
i came here to tell you i still love you
what uh what did you what
and i know i probably shouldn’t even be here telling you this i mean you’re with chandler a guy i really like and if you say he’s straight i’ll believe you
after seeing ya the other night i knew if i didn’t tell ya i’d regret it for the rest of my life
letting you go was the stupidest thing i ever did
y’know you’re really not supposed to be back here
i know this is the wrong time and the wrong place but i had to tell ya
i wanna spend my life with you
i wanna have kids with you
oh god… why don’t they put chairs back here
i know this is crazy but am i too late
what the… yes you’re too late
where was all this three years ago
well i know i was an idiot
and i tried to forget you i really did
y’know after we had lunch last year i spent six months in africa trying to get you out of my head
what were you doing in africa
what are you doing to me
oh look i i… i’m sorry but umm this this this this is not going to happen
okay that’s fine i’ll walk away
and i’ll never bother you again but only if you tell me chandler’s willing to give you everything i am
yeah i mean marriage is all he talks about
my goodness in fact i’m the one that’s making him wait
i know they’re gonna be so happy together
ohh… i mean two best friends falling in love how often does that happen
i’m so happy and not at all jealous
i mean i’m probably 98 happy maybe 2 jealous
hey uh have you guys scene chandler
wh no but y’know who did stop in here looking for ya tennille
so that marriage stuff that you were saying yesterday you don’t really believe that do you
in fact i think the whole concept of marriage is unnatural
let’s take a second here and look at pigs
okay pigs don’t mate for life
i mean a pig can have like a hundred sexual partners in a lifetime and that’s just an ordinary pig not even a pig that’s good at sports
yeah but that’s pigs not people
if marriage worked i’d be all for it
but do you know what the divorce rate in this country is
are you honestly telling me that that you may never want to get married
well never say never but y’know probably uh yeah never
then then then what are we even doing
is this some new kind of strategy
why don’t you put down your copy of ‘the rules’ huh mantrap
it’s okay i got a plan
yeah i’m pretty confident about that
that’s what makes it so easy for me to be 80 happy for monica and chandler
it would be nice to have a little guarantee though
well y’know some people make deals with a friend like if neither of them are married by the time they’re 40 they marry each other
yeah i locked him years ago
wh… so… if neither of you are married by the time you’re 40 you’re gonna marry joey
yeah but believe me that is not how he wanted to seal the deal
i think his exact words were…
well hey it’s just a backup
this is for my boat pretty cool huh
i’m just having one of those days where you realize you’re in a dead end relationship
chandler giving you a hard time huh
it’s not like i want to get married tomorrow
it’s just that i i’d like to believe that i’m in a relationship that’s actually going somewhere that i’m not just wasting my time
it’s like it’s like something’s changed
chandler is a complex fellow one who is unlikely to take a wife
is that some kind of boat talk
i haven’t totally decided how to talk on my boat yet
does he think i’m just gonna wait around for nothing
monica face it chandler is against marriage
well there’s some people who do want to marry me
r r richard said he wants to marry you
and and chandler’s tellin’ ya how much he hates marriage
you just told me that he hates marriage
that that he’s a a complex fellow who’s unlikely to take a wife
that that he’s against marriage and always will be
you got that from what i said
when the cretaceous period ended the dinosaurs were gone
hey y’know i’m so sorry to hear about you and elizabeth
yeah i really thought we’d be able to make it work but uh i guess it just wasn’t meant to be
it’s a tricky business isn’t it
so what do you say we make a pact
if you and i are both single by the time we’re 40 we get married
i mean we know each other we like each other and we’ve we’ve already slept together so y’know there’ll be no surprises there
you you want me to be your backup
ohh yeah i already have one
wait a but but she just she said that joey was her backup
i just had a conversation with her and she said that she and joey made a deal
i mean we have had a deal for years
we we we shook on it although believe me she wanted to do a lot more than that
where the hell have you been
i was making a coconut phone with the professor
richard told monica he wants to marry her
yeah i’ve been trying to find ya to tell to stop messing with her and maybe i would have if these damn boat shoes wouldn’t keep flying off
he’s not supposed to ask my girlfriend to marry him
well what… y’know what i’m gonna do
i’m gonna go over there i’m gonna kick his ass
look chandler i don’t think us getting our asses kicked is a solution
i’m gonna go find her and i’m just going to propose
let me know about that coconut phone it might great for the boat
i don’t know why i’m here
well i’ll just leave the door open and go sit on the couch
if it bothers you i can put my art out
so monica let me ask you a question
y’know since we broke up do you ever think about me
uh yeah i i actually i thought about you a couple months ago
yeah but it was because i i had an eye exam and i don’t like my new eye doctor
do you ever think about me in a non eye doctor way
but getting over was the hardest thing that i’ve ever had to do
and i never let myself think about you
you can not have two backups
it’s just good sense to backup your backup
phoebe how could you do this to me
i don’t look i don’t know what you’re complaining about now
you were both aware of the situation
okay this kind of back talk is not gonna fly when we’re married
phoebe you can’t have both of them
i don’t want to end up an old maid
all right well let’s see ross is a good father but joey has a boat this is hard
hey look i wanna switch to rachel
ooh i wanna switch to rachel too
don’t make any rash decisions okay
just remember my promise when we get married three times a week
i know i know how to settle this
all right here this is what we’re gonna do
i’m gonna write joey on one napkin and i’m gonna right ross on the other napkin and we are going to pick one
and that person is going to be our backup
i missed you you ugly flat faced old freak
now this is a grown up’s apartment
y’know i i should be with a grown up do you know what i mean
you’re saying you need to be with someone more mature
maybe someone with a license to practice medicine
y’know let’s face it i’m not a kid anymore
i i need to be with someone who who wants the same things that i do
i mean coming to my place of work and telling me that you love me i want that
talking about pig s x over lunch i don’t want that
please don’t even talk to me about fair
fair would’ve been you wanting to marry me back then
or fair would’ve been chandler wanting to marry me now
believe me nothing about this is fair
y’know i i… i have to figure…some st y’know some stuff before i can…
take as much time as you want
ten even twenty minutes if you need it
she’s not here and please come in
scotch on the rocks with a twist on a coaster
okay she was here but she left
well she said she had to think things over
oh my god i can’t believe this
y’know i thought…i thought you were a good guy
so you didn’t tell my girlfriend that you love her
well all right one thing happened
do you know what you did
my girlfriend is out there thinking things over
and what does she have to think about
well apparently i’m willing to offer her things that you are not
but i am willing to offer her all those things
this was just a plan y’know
a way to throw her off course so that when i offered her all these things she’d be surprised
well if it helps it worked very well
it was working until you showed up you big tree
you had your chance with her
you had your chance and you blew it
and this is my chance and i am not going to blow it because we are meant for each other
and this is all just been one stupid mistake
yeah i even got a ring
no i don’t have a ring
and can i give you a piece of advice
if you do get her don’t let her go
y’know richard…you are a good guy
i can’t talk to you now i gotta find monica
she had a bag and she left
she she said you guys want different things and that and that she needed time to think
well why didn’t you stop her
why didn’t you just tell her it was a plan
well where… where did she go
to her parent’s i think and she said you shouldn’t call her
but if i were you i would
i can’t believe i ruined this
you wanted it to be a surprise
chandler… in all my life… i never thought i would be so lucky
as to…fall in love with my best…my best… there’s a reason why girls don’t do this
oh god i thought… wait a minute i i can do this
i thought that it mattered what i said or where i said it
then i realized the only thing that matters is that you you make me happier than i ever thought i could be
and if you’ll let me i will spend the rest of my life trying to make you feel the same way
i knew you were likely to take a wife
ohhh this is the least jealous i’ve ever been
oh no wait no this is wrong
oh hell he’s done this three times
